page.title: 16Children's clubs
page.content: Every Monday from 6_ 0 clock till 8 _ o clock at the Methodist church a group called Girls Brigade is held. To open we sing a hymn and say a prayer .Then we split up into explorers _ juniors and seniors .I am in the juniors and over the last two months I have been studying care of pets,bible study and drill .Last night we had a get together and we had a quiz and some skipping games .Then we sat round a pretend camp fire and sang songs and after that we went into the meeting room and Mrs Buroway gave us some chocolate .Then we went home.I enjoy going to girls brigade very much.Also in the village for girls tthere are Brownies,ballet and tap dancing and for boys there are scouts, boys brigade and Wootton Rangers Football Club and for boys and girl there is explorers.
